revised_title: Effects of Cerebral Anaemia and Ligation of Cerebral Arteries on Convulsions and Health
tldr: The article discusses the effects of cerebral anaemia and ligation of cerebral arteries on convulsions and health. The author presents various experiments and case studies to understand the consequences of blocking blood flow to the brain. The results show that blocking blood flow to the brain can lead to convulsions, paralysis, and even death, depending on the animal and the method used. The author concludes that understanding these effects is crucial for developing treatments for conditions like epilepsy and improving brain health.
